name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT Quick Buttons for your text

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Insert your custom prompts into ChatGPT, Claude, Copilot, 1 click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now also works with English versions of Claude and Copilot! Now you can backup your profile in user interface! (look down there)

ChatGPT Quick Buttons for Your Text!
Insert your custom prompts into ChatGPT (And Claude and copilot) with a single click!

Works in Claude (English version of site is only one that has been tested, if does not work, try switching to it.)
Works in Copilot (English version of site is only one that has been tested)

Create and customize buttons that insert your frequently used prompts or use pre-defined ones. Settings and profiles, simple, just works. Buttons are added directly into the ChatGPT input field and you can auto-send any button individually. Save time and streamline your conversations by having your personalized prompts readily accessible. Easy to use interface. Free and open-source. Not sending your data anywhere. Saves your prompts in your browser's synchronized storage.


Features
Customizable Buttons: Create buttons with your own prompts or messages to insert into ChatGPT instantly.
Profiles Management: Organize your buttons into different profiles for various contexts or projects.
Emoji Icons: Assign any emoji as an icon for your buttons to easily identify them. Press Windows key + . (dot) to open the emoji picker. OR use any character! For example, use "3" to "explain in 3 sentences"
Auto-send Option: Enable or disable auto-send for each button, allowing messages to be sent automatically after insertion.
Keyboard Shortcuts: Activate keyboard shortcuts (Alt + 1 to Alt + 0) to trigger your custom buttons without clicking.
Separators: Organize your buttons by adding separators for better visual grouping.
In-Browser Settings: Manage all your settings and configurations directly within your browser for convenience.
How to Use
Access Extension Settings: Click on the extension icon in your Chrome toolbar to open the settings popup.
Create a Profile: Use the "Add Profile" button to create a new profile for your buttons.
Download and upload profile: Use keys at the bottom of user interface.
Add Custom Buttons:
Enter an emoji in the "Button Icon" field. You can copy paste any emoji here - your AI can suggest them. You can press Windows key + . (dot) to open the emoji picker.
Type your custom prompt or message in the "Button Template Text" field.
Click "Add Button" to add it to your button list.
Organize Buttons: Use drag-and-drop to reorder your buttons or add separators for better organization.
Configure Settings:
Toggle "Enable Global Auto-send" to automatically send messages upon button click.
Toggle "Enable Keyboard Shortcuts" to use Alt + [Number] shortcuts for your buttons. Only first 9 buttons have shortcuts. 
Switch Profiles: Easily switch between different profiles using the dropdown menu in the settings popup.
Enhance your ChatGPT interactions by customizing it to suit your needs. With ChatGPT Quick Buttons, your most-used prompts are just a click or keystroke away!

If something doesn't work, reload browser and if it doesn't help, contact me. Extension should not break anything by design and leaves system empty after uninstalling.
